title: Computers
need_statement: residents needed support to be able to use a computer confidently
skill_question: How many said they had computer related expertise they could share with neighbours?

title: Bicycle Repairs
need_statement: people said they could use some support to repair bicycles
skill_question: How many locals responded that they could carry out bicycle maintenance?

title: Home Decorating
need_statement: respondents would like some help decorating their homes
skill_question: What number of respondents said they had experience and skill in decorating?

title: Home Repairs
need_statement: needed help carrying out home repairs
skill_question: How many said they had practical experience of home repairs?

title: Helping with Transport
need_statement: could benefit from getting lifts to appointments
skill_question: What number do you think said would be able to provide lifts to people?

title: Needlework
need_statement: wanted help with sewing, embroidery and knitting
skill_question: How many do you think had the ability to provide support?

title: Health and Fitness
need_statement: would like to learn yoga and/or do a fitness course
skill_question: What number do you think said they could provide this?

title: Music
need_statement: would like to learn or develop their skills in playing music
skill_question: How many said they would have enough experience and/or qualification to teach music?
